snippet: A chef’s passage from town to country has been accompanied by a shift in culinary culture, from avant-garde act to a heartier, simpler cuisine.
abstract: Stephanie Lyness reviews Pip's at The Copper Beech Inn in Ivoryton (Metropolitan/Connecticut).
lead_paragraph: A chef’s passage from town to country has been accompanied by a shift in culinary culture, from avant-garde act to a heartier, simpler cuisine.

headline.seo: A Review of Pip’s at The Copper Beech Inn, in Ivoryton
